Package api

Class MyApiApplication

java.lang.Object
api.MyApiApplication
@SpringBootApplication @RestController public class MyApiApplication extends Object
The main class for the Milionerzy API application.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method to start the Spring Boot application.
      Parameters:
      args - Command line arguments.

    • getQuestion

      @GetMapping("/question") public String getQuestion(@RequestParam(name="roundNumber") String roundNumber)
      Retrieves a question for a specified round number.
      Parameters:
      roundNumber - The round number for which the question is requested.
      Returns:
      The question and answer choices formatted as a single string.

    • getRanking

      @GetMapping("/ranking") public String getRanking()
      Retrieves the top 10 rankings from the database.
      Returns:
      A string containing the user login and score, separated by '/' and terminated by ';'.

    • checkLogin

      @GetMapping("/login") public String checkLogin(@RequestParam(name="login") String login, @RequestParam(name="password") String password)
      Checks the login credentials against the database.
      Parameters:
      login - The user login.
      password - The user password.
      Returns:
      A string indicating whether the login was successful.

    • addUser

      @PostMapping("/register") public String addUser(@RequestParam(name="login") String login, @RequestParam(name="password") String password, @RequestParam(name="mail") String mail)
      Registers a new user in the database.
      Parameters:
      login - The user login.
      password - The user password.
      mail - The user email.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the success or failure of the registration process.

    • saveScore

      @PostMapping("/saveScore") public String saveScore(@RequestParam(name="login") String login, @RequestParam(name="score") String score)
      Saves the user's score in the database.
      Parameters:
      login - The user login.
      score - The user score.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the success or failure of the score saving process.

    • sendActivationCode

      @GetMapping("/sendActivationCode") public String sendActivationCode(@RequestParam(name="login") String login)
      Sends an activation code to the user's email address.
      Parameters:
      login - The user login.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the success or failure of the activation code sending process.

    • activateUser

      @GetMapping("/activateUser") public String activateUser(@RequestParam(name="login") String login)
      Activates a user in the database.
      Parameters:
      login - The user login.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the success or failure of the user activation process.

    • getActivationCode

      @GetMapping("/getActivationCode") public String getActivationCode(@RequestParam(name="login") String login)
      Retrieves the activation code for a user from the database.
      Parameters:
      login - The user login.
      Returns:
      The activation code or an error message.

    • getActivationStatus

      @GetMapping("/getActivationStatus") public String getActivationStatus(@RequestParam(name="login") String login)
      Retrieves the activation status for a user from the database.
      Parameters:
      login - The user login.
      Returns:
      A string indicating whether the user is activated or not.

    • sendScore

      @GetMapping("/sendScore") public String sendScore(@RequestParam(name="login") String login, @RequestParam(name="wynik") Integer wynik)
      Sends the user's score via email.
      Parameters:
      login - The user login.
      wynik - The user score.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the success or failure of the score sending process.
